content:
That's a great question! I'm really looking forward to finding a job in my field and building a career in Canada. I have a background in social work, and I'm passionate about helping others, so I'm hoping to find a role that allows me to make a positive impact in my new community. I'm also excited to continue learning and improving my English skills, so I can communicate more effectively and make the most of my new life.

In terms of personal goals, I'm looking forward to exploring Toronto and discovering all the amazing things it has to offer. I've heard so much about the city's diversity, culture, and food scene, and I can't wait to experience it all for myself. I'm also hoping to make new friends and connections in my community, and to find a sense of belonging in my new home.

Overall, I'm feeling a mix of emotions - excitement, nervousness, and a sense of uncertainty - but I'm trying to focus on the positive and
